title: Hanes Men's Beefy Long Sleeve Shirt, 1 or 2 Pack
description: Either tagless or with easily removed tearaway tag for comfort
Comes in a hefty 6.1-cover. Weight for added durability
Shoulder-to-shoulder taping helps prevent raveling and rip-out
Soft, pure cotton feels terrific all day long
Tightly knit for smoothness and strength; washable
If you love our famous beefy-t tee (and everybody does), you'll want to wear it year-round. That's where our long-sleeve version comes in.
